recipes.label: The Enemy Bides Time
recipes.startdescription: Our enemies are here in force, but none have yet made a move against us. The hours tick away. Soon.

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: Something Wicked This Way Comes
recipes.startdescription: Blood-scent and agony-echo so indelibly stain the world here. Strange and terrible enemies sally forth, drawn to the carnage: eager, hungry, hateful.

recipes.label: Something Wicked This Way Comes
recipes.startdescription: Blood-scent and agony-echo so indelibly stain the world here. Strange and terrible enemies sally forth, drawn to the carnage: eager, hungry, hateful.

recipes.label: Something Wicked This Way Comes
recipes.startdescription: Blood-scent and agony-echo so indelibly stain the world here. Strange and terrible enemies sally forth, drawn to the carnage: eager, hungry, hateful.

recipes.label: Something Wicked This Way Comes
recipes.startdescription: Blood-scent and agony-echo so indelibly stain the world here. Strange and terrible enemies sally forth, drawn to the carnage: eager, hungry, hateful.

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: Movement in the wilderness - something is coming.

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: A Pincer Attack!
recipes.startdescription: Two of our adversaries have decided to strike at the same time - strategy, or sheer ill luck? Either way, we can expect a nasty skirmish ahead.

recipes.label: A Pincer Attack!
recipes.startdescription: Two of our adversaries have decided to strike at the same time - strategy, or sheer ill luck? Either way, we can expect a nasty skirmish ahead.

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: One of our enemies seeks to strike at us -

recipes.label: A Coordinated Attack!
recipes.startdescription: This Enemy joins its force with another -

recipes.label: A Coordinated Attack!
recipes.startdescription: This Enemy joins its force with another -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: One of our enemies seeks to strike at us -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: One of our enemies seeks to strike at us -

recipes.label: A Supply Raid!
recipes.startdescription: Our stockpiled supplies and resources now come under threat -

recipes.label: Scrambling Positions
recipes.startdescription: An adversary withdraws to shroud themselves.

recipes.label: Targeting Infrastructure!
recipes.startdescription: The enemy seeks to sever a vital artery of the war effort -

recipes.label: Losing Ground!
recipes.startdescription: Hostile troops move on the map. Our enemies have undertaken a concerted effort to cut us off from our supply lines -

recipes.label: Enemy Reinforcements!
recipes.startdescription: More on the way - the Germans are calling for more of their forces to come east.

recipes.label: Enemy Reinforcements!
recipes.startdescription: The ranks of the enemy swell with new blood and new firepower. So be it - we'll kill them, too.

recipes.label: No Enemies?
recipes.startdescription: No-one comes to attack us. This doesn't feel right.

recipes.label: Mount a Defense
recipes.startdescription:
The enemy approaches - can we rise to meet them?

[Defend by providing a card to equal any of the Enemy's Thresholds.]

recipes.label: Mount a Defense
recipes.startdescription:
The enemy approaches - can we rise to meet them?

[Defend by providing a card to equal any of the Enemy's Thresholds.]

recipes.label: A Voracious Abomination!
recipes.startdescription:
The Grail-behemoth barrels forth! It's going to devour something, I can't stop that - but perhaps I could provide it something more tempting to eat.

[Provide an Ally or any corpse to defend against the ingluviate. The card used to defend will be destroyed.]

recipes.label: The Casket is Taken!
recipes.startdescription: The iron casket is subsumed! It vanishes behind the ingluviate's lashing tongues and slobbering lips -

recipes.label: The Casket is Taken!
recipes.startdescription: The iron casket is subsumed! It vanishes behind the ingluviate's lashing tongues and slobbering lips -

recipes.label: The Casket is Taken!
recipes.startdescription: The iron casket is subsumed! It vanishes behind the ingluviate's lashing tongues and slobbering lips -

recipes.label: A Tantalising Diversion
recipes.startdescription: The smell of rotting carcasses makes the ingluviate salivate horrendously. It turns course from the casket, drawn now to the morbid feast we have laid out for it -
recipes.description: Devoured.

recipes.label: A Tantalising Diversion
recipes.startdescription: The smell of fear - adrenaline, rushing blood, goosebumped flesh - makes the ingluviate salivate horrendously. It turns course from the casket, drawn now to the unfortunate feast we have laid out for it -
recipes.description: Devoured.

recipes.label: Mount a Defense?
recipes.startdescription:
The enemy approaches - can we rise to meet them?

[Defend by providing a card to equal any of the Enemy's Thresholds.]

recipes.label: Defence, Inviolate
recipes.startdescription: The meridians of my soul align with the meridians of my flesh. My scars armour me. I cannot be wounded.

recipes.label: An Immortal Ally
recipes.startdescription: @#friend.sergei|A harrowing of jagged steel and stamping hooves drives the enemy back. As he works, the Iron-Eater laughs.#friend.gyrvaengr|With claw, with stinger, with scales invincible the Carapace-warrior sets herself against the enemy advance, each of fatal movements bearing the uncanny lightness of a memory.@

recipes.label: Successful Counterattack!
recipes.startdescription: Stand and fight.
recipes.description: The enemy is driven back, this time.

recipes.label: Pulled Through a Perilous Door
recipes.startdescription: The claviger brandishes a ring of iron keys and utters a crackling word - something in Vak, I think. Space folds. Colour shimmers. And where my allies stand, the skin of the world parts, and they are pulled into the Mansus without so much as a sound.

recipes.label: Out of Bounds
recipes.startdescription:
Gone from this plane. For how long? I don't know, and I don't have long to think about it. Got to keep moving.

[These Allies will remain in stasis until the timer ends, and will not travel with you if you leave the Current Warzone before they are freed. However, until the timer ends, Légion Clavigers cannot place any more of your Allies in stasis.]

recipes.label: Out of Bounds
recipes.startdescription:
Gone from this plane. For how long? I don't know, and I don't have long to think about it. Got to keep moving.

[These Allies will remain in stasis until the timer ends, and will not travel with you if you leave the Current Warzone before they are freed. However, until the timer ends, Légion Clavigers cannot place any more of your Allies in stasis.]
recipes.description: The skin of the world buckles, then tears. Our allies come tumbling unceremoniously back into the waking world.

recipes.label: Whispers of Bliss
recipes.startdescription: In the dark, she speaks to us. Oh, how our ears are wont to listen, our nerves wont to ease, our minds to forget -

recipes.label: The Stridulous Song
recipes.startdescription: The noise slices through the shadowed wilderness. My sight fractures and brightens; my ears tremble and weep. And when silence falls again, my skull yet rings with calamitous birdsong...

recipes.label: No Defense!
recipes.startdescription: We could not muster the strength to meet our enemy in combat. Now follow the consequences of our weakness -

recipes.label: No Defense!
recipes.startdescription: We could not muster the strength to meet our enemy in combat. Now follow the consequences of our weakness -

recipes.label: No Defense!
recipes.startdescription: Blood in the air. Casualties.

recipes.label: No Survivors
recipes.startdescription: Screams are silenced. Blood grows black in the moonlight. This enemy had shown no mercy.

recipes.label: No Defense!
recipes.startdescription: Blood in the air. Casualties.

recipes.label: Abhorrence, Blossoming
recipes.startdescription: The touch of the Crowned Growth promises not death, but life. One learns quickly to fear that promise.

recipes.label: Lost Resources!
recipes.startdescription: Our resources go up in flames!

recipes.label: Lost Resources!
recipes.startdescription: Our resources go up in flames!

recipes.label: Reduced to Rubble!
recipes.startdescription: Our vital facilities are destroyed!

recipes.label: An Elusive Adversary
recipes.startdescription: The battle is over, but amidst the thronging smoke and the forests of rubble, our adversary has managed to disappear. Tricky.

recipes.label: An Elusive Adversary
recipes.startdescription: The battle is over, but amidst the thronging smoke and the forests of rubble, our adversary has managed to disappear. Tricky.

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: The Enemy Acts!
recipes.startdescription: The alarm cries out - our adversary mobilises!

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: The Wehrmacht makes a counter-advance against the soldiers of the Red Army -
recipes.description: The field is quiet. The Germans could not muster the manpower for their attack.

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: The Wehrmacht makes a counter-advance against the soldiers of the Red Army -

recipes.label: The Enemy Prevails!
recipes.startdescription: In the distance, I see the Russian line break apart under the duress of German artillery-fire and aerial-bombing: it is brutal killing, done with brutal efficiency. The Germans are nothing, if not efficient.

recipes.label: The Enemy Retreats!
recipes.startdescription: The German counter-attack crumples against the Soviet response. Outgunned and outnumbered, the Wehrmacht's soldiers hurry back to their lines. The front remains unmoved; neither side is yet the victor.

recipes.label: None Found?
recipes.startdescription: The Germans, at this moment, could not find an appropriate subject for attack.

recipes.label: A Pincer Attack!
recipes.startdescription: The enemy has devised a double-fronted attack against its adversaries -

recipes.label: A Pincer Attack!
recipes.startdescription: The enemy has devised a double-fronted attack against its adversaries -
